attributes.action: Remove all CCTV cameras from our cities and replace them with more police officers on the beat!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Welcome to 1984 if you want your lives back from the cowards sitting in their control towers then sign this petition to remove all CCTV cameras from our cities and replace them with more police officers on the beat! We also want to, create more jobs within the police force and establish a sense of security on a face to face level within our communities.
